definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Electromagnetic interference is less of a problem for digital connections.
sentences.chinese: 數字設備連接很少有電磁干擾。

sentences.english: Anti-EMI , protection of wrong power connection.
sentences.chinese: 抗電磁干擾，電源錯接保護。

sentences.english: Experts think this is caused by electromagnetic interference.
sentences.chinese: 專家們認爲這是由於電磁干擾。

sentences.english: Study of the analogue test method of electric initiators resistant to electromagnetic interference be described as well.
sentences.chinese: 並開展了對火工品抗電磁干擾模擬測試方法的研究。

sentences.english: High-density double shielding for maximum rejection of RFI and EMI.
sentences.chinese: 高密度雙重屏蔽最大拒絕射頻干擾和電磁干擾。

sentences.english: Vehicle body gap is the important coupling way of vehicle electromagnetic interference.
sentences.chinese: 汽車車身縫隙是汽車電磁干擾的重要耦合途徑。

sentences.english: The system has isolation protection measures to avoid electro-magnetic interference.
sentences.chinese: 爲防止電磁干擾，系統採取了有效的隔離保護措施。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
